name: Smoked Eggs
instructions: Smoke eggs with wood chips for 15 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Roasted Pork Chops
instructions: Rub pork chops with oil, garlic, rosemary, salt, and pepper. Roast at 400°F for 25-30 minutes.

name: Spicy Lime Grilled Shrimp
instructions: Marinate shrimp in lime juice, chili powder, garlic, and oil for 15 minutes. Grill for 2-3 minutes per side.

name: Baked Chicken Breasts
instructions: Season chicken breasts with oil, salt, pepper, and herbs. Bake at 375°F for 20-25 minutes.

name: Crunchy French Onion Chicken
instructions: Coat chicken in beaten eggs, then in soup mix and breadcrumbs. Bake at 375°F for 30 minutes.

name: Barbeque Bacon Chicken Bake
instructions: Top chicken with barbecue sauce, bacon, and cheese. Bake at 400°F for 20-25 minutes.

name: Avocado Salad
instructions: Combine diced avocado, tomato, onion, and cilantro. Dress with lime juice, salt, and pepper.

name: Sausage with Peppers and Potatoes
instructions: Sauté sliced sausage, peppers, and potatoes in oil. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Grilled Onions
instructions: Slice onions, coat with oil, salt, and pepper. Grill until tender and caramelized.
